name: Blackfeet Water Rights Settlement
objective: In 2016, the Blackfeet Water Rights Settlement passed (PL 114-322) and the Blackfeet Tribe along with Reclamation and BIA have obligations to fulfill.

results.description: 638 contract awards are anticipated for the planning, design, and construction of the Blackfeet Municipal, Rural, Industrial Water Supply System.

authorizations.text: Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act, Title III, Subtitle G, 3701-3724, The Blackfeet Water Rights Settlement Act. Pub. L. 114, 322.
